summary: In this context, 1,1,2,2-tetrachloroethene and trichlorobenzene are both mentioned as part of a broader study analyzing concentrations of various volatile organic compounds (VOCs) in surface waters. However, there is no direct discussion of their relationship, interactions, or specific relevance to each other within the monitoring study. They are simply listed among other analytes of interest without further elaboration on their chemical or biological significance.
